title: The Gift of the Magi
description: The Gift of the Magi recounts the story of Della and Jim, two young lovers living in New York City in the early 1900s. Although poor in pocket, they are rich in love, and each is willing to sell their most valued possessions in order to buy a Christmas gift for the other. Della cuts and sells her long locks of sumptuous hair to buy a chain for Jim's favorite watch, while Jim simultaneously sells his watch to buy a set of combs for Della.
meta: Use the reading strategy of making, revising, and confirming predictions before and during reading
Cause and Effect : Identify cause-and-effect relationships in the story
Prepositional Phrases : Identify and use prepositional phrases
Similes : Identify and understand the use of similes

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
